ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Hunting grounds for 50+
ygData.msgSnippet: heheh you and me both Su.  those floors are  dangerous as all get out. Kinda reminds me of the time I first went on a guild raid to Lguk and fell off the
ygData.messageBody:
heheh you and me both Su. those floors are dangerous as all get out. Kinda
reminds me of the time I first went on a guild raid to Lguk and fell off the
narrow boards and was immediately agroed by the mobs and it took over 4
hours for them to find my corpse lol and I was bound umm in all places
Neriak heh had been bound there since I was born and I was a level 23 atm
lol

but the secret of course when going up some of the icy ones is to look
walk with sow off follow someone who has been there before and who can
show you exactly where to step etc. It took me only one fall and 2 trips
getting form the zone entrance in GD to the upper area to the Tents to
learn how to get up that far safely. getting out though was the bad part
cause part of the way you cant get out the same way you got in lol so I
wound up doing the ninja zone where I faced a certain wall in the pit
invised so not to get agro ran into the wall and camped out came back
camped out again and was back at zone entrance to GD.

As for the crowding yeah we get that on the Saryn server as of late as
well. Our Raid coordinator for my guild got a bunch of us together and
had us camp there and each of us would play an alt and he would join
whatever group was at the tents and let us know in raid chat what class was
leaving and to have the corresponding guildy log on that char in Velks and
fill in the slot till we had all guildies in the group lol. we spent a
whole weekend doing this and we eventually had it to where except for once
or twice we had nothing but guildies at the tents in Velks

Cynfyn
----- Original Message -----
From: "Su" <suceress@...>


> Velks is good. I don't like going up high there. I made it to 51 and 52 in
> Velks. But lately it's been too crowded and I haven't been able to find a
> group.
> Im not familiar with the tent. I do the floor where you come in either in
> one of the side rooms or on the middle room in the back. I've sometimes
gone
> up to SH. I really hate going up those narrow passageways though.
especially
> with the slippery ice.
> luv,
> -Su
